Description:
IN/SPD020322/01-312359688
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to metal working fluid mist, which is a substance hazardous to health, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled in that; you have failed to ensure that there are appropriate work processes and suitable engineering controls in place to control exposure to metalworking fluid mist produced by the machining processes carried out at the CNC machines in your workshop such as the HAAS VF2SS CNC milling machine.
